src_original: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ indriyaparāparatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.  yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat.  idaṃ caturthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ.
tgt_original: 如實知他眾生諸根上下相，四力也。

src_original: yena baleneti pūrvavat.  punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato nānāvimuktikaṃ lokam anekavimuktikam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.  yad āyuṣmaṃtas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat.  idaṃ paṃcamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ.
tgt_original: 如實知他眾生種種欲解，五力也。

src_original: yena baleneti pūrvavat.  punar aparam āyuṣmaṃtas tathāgto nānādhātukaṃ anekadhātukam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.  yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ [Tib.308a] pūrvavat.  idaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ.
tgt_original: 如實知世間種種無數性，六力也。

src_original: yena baleneti pūrvavat.  punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.  yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 642) pūrvavat.  idaṃ saptamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ.  yena baleneti pūrvavat.  punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati.
tgt_original: 如實知一切至處道，七力也。

src_original: tadyathaikām api jātiṃ dve tisraś catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśa viṃśatiṃ yāvad anekān api saṃvartavivartakalpān anusmarati.
tgt_original: 知種種宿命，有相、有因緣，一世、二世乃至百千世，劫初劫盡，我在彼眾生中生：

src_original: amī nāma te bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ.  yatrāham āsa evaṃnāmā evaṃjātya evaṃgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃ dīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitikaḥ evamāyuṣparyantaḥ so 'haṃ tasmāt sthānāc cyuto 'mutropapannaḥ tasmād api cyuta ihopapannaḥ.  iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati.  yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat.
tgt_original: 如是姓，如是名，如是飲食、苦樂、壽命長短；

src_original: idam aṣṭamāṃ tathāgatabalaṃ.  yena baleneti pūrvavat.
tgt_original: 彼中死、是間生，是間死、還生是間，此間生姓名、飲食、苦樂、壽命長短亦如是，八力也。

src_original: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāṃtamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavanān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān durvarṇān durbalān hīnān praṇītān sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagān sattvān [Tib.308b] yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty amī bhavantaḥ kāyaduścaritena smanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvagatāḥ.
tgt_original: 佛天眼淨，過諸天眼，見眾生死時生時、端正醜陋、若大若小、若墮惡道若墮善道； 如是業因緣受報：

src_original: āryāṇām apavādakāḥ mithyādṛṣṭayo mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetuṃ tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipāte
tgt_original: 是諸眾生惡身業成就、惡口業成就、惡意業成就、謗毀聖人，受邪見業因緣故，身壞死時入惡道，生地獄中； 是諸眾生善身業成就，善口業成就，善意業成就，不謗毀聖人，受正見業因緣故，身就壞時入善道，生天上，九力也。
